text: Sarah I'm learning about functions and programming and I'm not sure how to use them. Functions are like small reusable tasks that you can use in your code. Thanks for explaining Sarah. I see many functions in our code but I'm not sure what each of these does. No problem Tom. To understand them you can look at their names and comments. Comments explain that function's purpose. Got it. So that means I should read the function names and comments to what these functions do.
